entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Resolute
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 09:25 AM CST Saturday 11 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Ice Crystals, -39.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Resolute Airport 12:00 PM CST Saturday 11 February 2023
Condition: Ice Crystals
Temperature: -39.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.4 kPa falling
Visibility: 40.2 km
Humidity: 66 %
Wind Chill: -52
Dewpoint: -43.1°C
Wind: NNW 13 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly sunny. High minus 36.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light late this afternoon. High minus 36. Wind chill minus 55 this morning and minus 46 this afternoon. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Saturday 11 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: A few clouds. Low minus 38.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy near midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 38. Wind chill near minus 48. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Saturday 11 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 34. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 34. Wind chill minus 51 in the morning and minus 45 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Saturday 11 February 2023
